review: Came quickly and set up was fast. Love it!
author: Karly Sanders

review: this version is an improvement over the previous version in 2 aspects (for my use):  1) true HDMI and 2) Bluetooth mirroring without wifi.However, since the main reason to upgrade was the Bluetooth mirroring without wifi, that function is sometimes difficult to get to work.  We use it in a business setting and need easy access to put iPad screens on a screen/projector. It only captures an iPad 50%of the time.  We cannot use wifi because we are unable to set up Apple TV over the company firewall.
author: T. J.

review: Yet another great product from Apple. Never had a problem, and I personally think the picture is way better than cable tv.
author: James Dunbar

review: One word..... AMAZING! Time to get rid of cable TV and save 100.00 a month
author: Dominick

review: does what I need it to
author: Amazon Customer
